title: Agent-PLAN Schema
description: Canonical structure produced by the Main-LLM so the orchestrator can decide whether to call RAG, SQL or both.

route.description: Primary execution path: pure SQL, pure RAG, or combined.

entities.description: Key-value map of extracted entities. Values may be string, number, boolean, array, object or null.

sql_prompt.description: Concise English question given to the Text-to-SQL model.

policy_query.description: Free-text query used for vector search if `route` is RAG or BOTH.

language.description: Language in which the final answer should be generated.
